plurals.name: supportedNbMonths
plurals.item: 以 %2$s 身分贊助 lichess.org %1$s 個月

plurals.name: practicedNbPositions
plurals.item: 在 %2$s 練習了 %1$s 個棋局

plurals.name: solvedNbPuzzles
plurals.item: 解決了 %s 個戰術題目

plurals.name: playedNbGames
plurals.item: 下了 %1$s 場%2$s類型的棋局

plurals.name: completedNbGames
plurals.item: 完成了 %s 場通信棋局

plurals.name: completedNbVariantGames
plurals.item: 完成了 %1$s %2$s 場通信棋局

plurals.name: competedInNbTournaments
plurals.comment:
Indicates that the user has competed in %s number of tournaments.
Please note this string used to say "tournaments" without qualifying them as "Arena tournaments", which used to be the only format available on Lichess. Please update as required.

plurals.name: rankedInTournament
plurals.item: 在%4$s錦標賽中下了%3$s盤棋局，排名第%1$s(前%2$s%%)

plurals.name: competedInNbSwissTournaments
plurals.item: 參與過 %s 場瑞士制錦標賽
